name: Hollow Earth
description:
https://games.gdevelop-app.com/game-b656d64a-05ed-4e72-909d-b18596bdc8a1/index.h...

Hollow Earth, is a game mixing 2D platformer and tower defense.

You dig to reach interior space and discover under-worlds. Enemies will try to stop you. To stop them you set traps. What happened if they reach you ? You become a hollow, and you have to pass through your own traps to reach your dead body and revive.

The game is in development. Now, I'm adding abilities to the different types of characters. Wizard Fire and Ice are in game. Not yet kunai and shield :/

The theme is really not final! Difficult to imagine warriors and ninja looking for hollow earth :p But it was the simpliest way to try the core mechanics (platformer/Tower defense) with different patterns (strength, agility and ''shut up it's magic'' ...).

I put this game on itchio to know what you think of the mechanics. And to imagine together a coherent universe.

Control are simple : 

ZQSD, sorry I'm French :D I will try to change this (I mean controls not my nationality of course).

Space to jump.

Left mouse to use selected item (scroll to choose item).

Right mouse to use ability.

Enjoy the game :)
